values.description:
Dalco is a full-line distributor of commercial, institutional and industrial cleaning supplies and equipment. 
 
Dalco’s regional market area covers the state of Minnesota, parts of Wisconsin, Northern Iowa, and the Upper Peninsula of Michigan. Our four distribution locations include Dalco’s corporate headquarters in New Brighton, MN, with branch facilities in Duluth, MN Rochester, MN and LaCrosse, WI.

Since starting business in 1959, Dalco’s growth has been on a "service philosophy" that addresses the total needs of our customers. With today’s ever increasing labor costs, your annual "cleaning dollar" budget will be more effectively managed by implementing quality, preventive maintenance products and equipment. Moreover, Dalco provides hands-on training programs and maintains an extensive audiovisual film library.

values: Commercial, Institutional and Industrial Cleaning Supplies

values.name: Dalco
Gay Business Conference
values.description:
The 1-day GAY BUSINESS CONFERENCE taking place on 29 June 2010 in London, UK. This conference is for representatives from organisations and businesses of all types ('gay' and 'mainstream') in the UK, Europe and worldwide, to facilitate the exchange of information and expertise in doing business with consumers who identify as gay or bisexual.

We have a full programme of excellent guest speakers, ready to speak from personal experience about how they have developed their businesses and organisations successfully, targeting gay and bisexual customers, including: 6PC member Juan P. Juliá (Axel Hotels), Kim Watson (Millivres Prowler Group), Neil Spring (Village Drinks), Ian Johnson (Out Now Consulting), Matthew Todd (Attitude Magazine), Andrew Roberts (AMRO Worldwide) and Matthew D'Arcy (OMTAC and GMen Brighton).

Please visit the website for full details and to book securely online (www.gaybusinessconference.com), see you on Tuesday 29 June 2010!

values.name: Bulletin Newspapers
values.description: The Boston Bulletin is a weekly newspaper with local coverage in the Allston-Brighton, Northend, South Boston, Jamaica Plain, West Roxbury, Roslindale and Hyde Park neighborhoods.

values.name: British Arts Festival Association (BAFA)
values.description: BAFA is a vibrant membership organisation covering the widest span of arts festivals in the UK. These include some of the large international cultural events such as the Edinburgh International Festival and Brighton Festival through to small dynamic festivals such as the Winchester Hat Fair and the Corsham Festival in Wiltshire.

values.name: VisitJourneys.com Limited
values.description:
Journeys Hostels are a leading international hostel franchise based in London Bridge, England. They currently run four hostels in the UK- Kings Cross, Kennington, Greenwich West and Brighton and will be expanding internationally in the next five years. 

Their unique franchise model allows new and existing hostels to join the Journeys group, operate under its ever growing brand name, and take advantage of a comprehensive list of services and benefits.
 
Journeys are also one of the fastest growing backpacker brands in the world, priding themselves on, 'keeping the true spirit of backpacking alive'. Each of their hostel locations retains a unique personality, whilst at the same time conveying something that's 'unmistakably Journeys'. 

When guests stay at a Journeys Hostel they receive something more than just a place to lay their head. They become part of an international network of like minded backpackers who celebrate cultural interchange, responsible travel and global discovery.

values.name: CIIS
values.description: Continental Institute for International Studies, formerly known as the Canadian Institute for International Studies, has truly carved out a niche for itself as a provider of accredited International Education that transcends the boundaries of inter-continental divides, thus preparing the right groundwork for students to become future global professionals. CIIS has also established tie-up with UCOL, New Zealand, University of Brighton-UK and with AYR College, Scotland

Synapse Firing Squad is an independent Boston-based game development studio dedicated to making fun, innovative games for a variety of platforms.   We are based in Brighton, Massachusetts and we are all very passionate about games, and creating them.
values.name: Synapse Firing Squad
Konfine Limited
values.description:
A little about Konfine and what we do.

Konfine is a small Web Design and Development agency based along the South Coast of the UK, located between Brighton and Chichester. We specialise in combining our knowledge of the internet, databases and wide range of programming languages to provide bespoke web solutions that match our and your clients needs.

We have a huge range of services that can help in getting your website started in the best possible way. We start our process developing your solution in a graphical form - Web Deisgn. Once you're happy with the design and added any additions to the design phase the web development stage commences. Konfine uses the latest in development tools and all our websites are created with the maximum potential of Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) in mind. Choose as much content that you would like to be manageable using our easy to use Content Management System (CMS).

Scribble Digital are a mobile apps agency dedicated to connecting you with your audience in the digital sphere. We are looking at the future and how to sit your brand at the forefront.

Based by the sea in Brighton, we are a creative team with backgrounds across the media industry, that have come together to help clients create engaging digital and mobile solutions which fully integrate with the bigger picture. We work with our clients closely to take ideas from conception through to launch.

In the constantly evolving landscape of mobile we have committed ourselves to staying at the forefront of technology and what is possible. Scribble was formed in 2009 and we have over three years of expertise in creating and building apps, which in the world of mobile, is almost a lifetime.

We understand the importance of a strategy that is harmonious across a multi-channel environment. We specialise in digital; develop cross-platform mobile applications, create integrated digital strategies, embrace future technology, love augmented reality and deliver compelling website solutions.

Working with clients across the world to deliver creative and innovative digital solutions, we deliver measurable results providing genuine return on investment.

Scribble Digital are excited about digital and what is coming next.

Imagine, create, communicate.
values.name: Scribble Digital
Edgars Cool Water Limited
values.description:
Edgars Cool Water is one of the largest independant suppliers of water coolers and bottled water in the South of England, and provides an established quality service throughout the UK.

We provide a wide range of drinks solutions to support all of our customers needs from bottled and mains fed water coolers, water fountains, boilers and vending machines.

We are proud supporters of the British Heart Foundation and have played a significant role in their London to Brighton Bike Ride for many years handing out over 24,000 bottles of water at the finishing line, to rehydrate the deserving riders.

Whether you require a drinks solution or a complete profile of products, Edgars Cool Water can provide a service and soultion that meets your requirements and budget.

values.name: Tanks and Targets
values.description:
Tanks and Targets is the ideal Activity Centre for Stag or Hen weekends, Corporate Activity days, couples and individuals. Located in Findon West Sussex, North of Worthing, only 30 minutes from Brighton.
With 1200 acres set in the beautiful South Downs we cater for groups of all sizes and abilities. We're ideal for: Stag & Hen activity days, Corporate activity days, Group days and Birthdays.

values.name: Chapmans of Sevenoaks Ltd
values.description:
Chapman's of Sevenoaks supply superior locally sourced fish and seafood to many of the very best restaurants and hotels in Kent, East Sussex and London.

Chapman's have forged strong local partnerships that enable us to buy some of the best day boat catches along the Kent and Sussex coast, from Whitstable round to Brighton, allowing us to provide superior quality, locally sourced fish, fresh from the boats. This approach means that our local fish is fresher and will keep longer than most market fish, whilst reducing food miles and improving the traceability.

values.name: Apex Group, LTD
values.description: About Us - Apex Group (www.apex-group.org) is an international company headquartered in Brighton, England with offices in Chicago and Dallas.  In 1963 we began and continue today to be a used metalworking machinery dealer.  In 2001 we launched our auction services using an in-house online platform (www.apexauctions.com).  We are high focused on selling machine tools and complete plant contents.  Apex continually reinvests into this technology to better the results we attain for our clients.  An Apex online auction averages over 98% sell through with over 28% of all lots posted going offshore.  We have 150,000+ registered buying customers located in 59 countries and often realize 15% higher values over competitive solutions selling like type machines.  In 2009 Apex conducted over 150 equipment sales, averaged 118 registered bidders at each sale, with over 7,000,000 web views, selling 10,000+ machine tools at more than $24,000,000 in value.

values.name: Matt Wright Graphic Design
values.description:
T.07545 093 585 

A Brighton based graphic designer with 6 years experience and a personal passion for the creative process. I specialize in branding and corporate identity, striving to build and strengthen your company through distinctive visual communication. I can deliver unique ideas through to a powerful and impressive outcome. With a thorough understanding of print processes and finishes, I always strive to achieve the maximum for the client.

values.name: BarCamp London
values.description:
BarCamp London has traditionally been one of the UK's largest BarCamps. This free community event, is entirely funded from contributions from our generous sponsors.

Our last event was held in October 2009 and attracted well over 200 people from across the UK and Europe.

As well as BarCamp London, there have been events held in Bath, Blackpool, Bournemouth, Brighton, Cambridge, Leeds, Manchester and Newcastle, to name but a few.

Absolutely anyone can organise a BarCamp, and they can be as large or small as you wish. See barcamp.org for details.

Netleap is an innovative digital agency with offices in Brighton.

Our strategy focuses on you, and helps you promoting your style, products/services and brand.

DESIGN

We ensure that your website provides a compelling experience, which:

    * Creates an emotional power inspiring the hearts and minds of buyers/users
    * Delivers a strong message that establishes your value proposition 

INTERACTION

We set objectives that fit with your particular business model, and ensure your website delivers on:

    * Accessiblity: who you are, what you do, and how you do it
    * Communication: Open new channels of communication
    * Availability: Consistent delivery and always reachable 

REPORTING

We set up key performance indicators (KPIs) to ensure that focus is kept solely on the requirements and business objectives. Once the site has been delivered, we then report on a monthly basis.
values.name: Netleap

A one stop shop for professional action photographs from the Brighton and Hove football league.
View and buy your pictures here.

Personal styling. Set up in 2009, I am a self-employed stylist and writer working in Brighton. I work with women to help them realise their own style potential and am particularly involved in helping brides-to-be and mothers of the bride.

I also work as a writer.

values.description:
RAP Office Contracts provide a complete solution for office refurbishments for business, commercial, public sector, Housing Associations, blue chip companies throughtout London, Brighton and the South East.  

Identifying and understanding our clients key priorities we can provide a turnkey solution from space planning to design and build. Our business is enriched by the huge difference in projects and delivering outstanding refurbishments, all to ISO standard. 

Constructionline/Safe Contractor approved, appointed H & S Manager, CDM compliance.
values.name: RAP Office Contracts

values.description:
Smooth Transitions has been specializing in Newborn Care Specialist placements for over 15 years, making us one of the most established and respected agencies in Colorado.

Our unique system of determining a family's needs and matching them to our qualified, nonjudgmental Specialists makes the process of finding custom, in-home care easy and stress-free.

We care about and listen to everyone's needs. Our goal is to build long-lasting relationships and to help find the right Specialist for each family and the right family for each Specialist.

We place Newborn Care Specialists in the Denver Metro area, including but not limited to:

Arvada - Aurora
Boulder - Brighton - Broomfield
Castle Rock - Centennial - Colorado Springs - Commerce City
Denver
Edgewater - Englewood - Erie - Evergreen
Frederick
Glendale - Golden - Greenwood Village
Henderson - Highlands Ranch
Lafayette - Lakewood - Littleton - Lone Tree - Louisville
Morrison
Nederland - Northglenn
Parker
Superior
Thornton
Westminster - Wheat Ridge

Contact us today to find out more about our services and how we can help whatever your situation may be.﻿
